entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening then east 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm except 25 cm north of Bay Roberts. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early in the evening. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain or snow. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
